Name: Suspicious Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower
Desc: A crunchy delicacy. From the sorry side of the dish, it is easy to tell that this dish has been left out here for some time â€” water loss has already dried up and hardened the bread slices. Biting into it makes your chin sore... Next time, do remember to eat it while it's still nice and fresh...
Effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
